text: Mézériat is a commune in the Ain department in eastern France. ==Geography== The Veyle flows west through the southern part of the commune, crosses the village, then flows southwest and forms part of the commune's southwestern border. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Ain department ==References== *INSEE ==External links== *Mézériat website Category:Communes of Ain Category:Ain communes articles needing translation from French Wikipedia
title: Mézériat
